abstract.t: This Internet-Draft describes NFS version 4 minor version two, including features retained from the base protocol and protocol extensions made subsequently. Major extensions introduced in NFS version 4 minor version two include: XXX

note.title: Requirements Language
note.t: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.
